Token.Abstract: Sets up a service instance to trigger adapters at intervals to fetch data for updating a data model

Parameter.Name: adapters
Parameter.Abstract: an array of DMMSyncServiceAdapter instances. When nil, the sync service does nothing

Parameter.Name: queue
Parameter.Abstract: a queue on which the service should run Core Data operations. When nil, the service will use the main queue.

Token.Abstract: Synchronize Core Data entity instances with an array of updated model data in dictionaries

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the entity model to be synchronized

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: an NSManagedObjectContext on which Core Data tasks should be performed

Parameter.Name: identifierPropertyName
Parameter.Abstract: a property name with corresponding unique values in the data array objects and the core data model

Token.Abstract: Synchronize Core Data entity instances with an array of updated model data in dictionaries

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the entity model to be synchronized

Parameter.Name: identifierPropertyName
Parameter.Abstract: a property name with corresponding unique values in the data array objects and the core data model

Parameter.Name: queue
Parameter.Abstract: a queue on which the service should run Core Data operations. When nil, the service will use the main queue.
